item.title: Base R Shortcuts: A Collection of Lesser-Known Idioms and Coding Patterns for Writing Concise and Fast R Code
item.description: TL;DR: Please help me extend this GitHub repo by adding your own base R programming idioms: https://github.com/nanxstats/r-base-shortcuts. Snowboarder on a cloudy hill. Photo by Boba Jovanovic. For a long time, I’ve told people that I am not an R expert. I don’t know too much about R. I just happen to write software that encounters the least resistance when implemented in R. I’m shy. I’d rather solve problems myself than ask.
